text: Ate jinham lokam ne jhuthala'i'a uha jore-jore (samuha) banake usa de du'ara khaul'ha dite janage ate usa de pahiredara unham nu kahinage tuhade raba di'am a'itam suna'unde sana ate tuhanu tuhade isa dina di mulakata tom dara'unde sana. Uha kahinage ham. Paratu saza da va'ada avagi'akari'am de upara pura ho ke rahega
